ygData.messageBody:
"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>
> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Not sure on mana drain (I've heard very inefficient) but here is the max Hp
> drain..
>
> Lifetap (Sk Lvl 9, Necro lvl 1) - 5Hps
> LifeSpike (Sk Lvl 15, Necro Lvl 4) - 11Hps
> LifeDraw (Sk lvl 30, Necro Lvl 12) - 45Hps
>
> The word I'm think of is useless.
>

It's better than Reclaim Energy, Mend Bones, and Voice Graft. Being
able to use all my mana for more than half my hit points at level 33
is not a bad thing in my opinion.

I don't see how you can complain about this. Sure, we could probably
pick out better spells, but this is definately an improvement. If
I'm soloing, I can use these to half my downtime, or as a healing
boost once a mob is snared and running (in place) at the end of a fight.

Here's my math on this for my Level 33 DE SK:
HP: 845
Mana: 700
LifeDraw: 45 Hps for 63 Mana

So, I can cast 11 lifedraws at FM, which is 495 HP. Granted,
that's an ideal scenario.

Is that not enough healing for a damage oriented class?
No hybrid will get bind or gate, so what other rank 1,2, and 4 spells
could they have given us?

When it comes down to it, I have an option I never had before, and
that I cannot complain about.

Xilith
